column4: I have Spamassassin working with Evolution. If anyone is interested and wants directions I'll post a URL. It's a little slow so I wouldn't recommend it for people getting hundreds of email at the same time. Any better solution I'd love to hear about it
post it to the forums, I think.
uh.... forums.... forums.... where? There's official ones?
no offense, but I've seen several obuntu forums... wanted to make sure I was posting into the right ones. :)
